mapper.select: SELECT history_index FROM history_tbl WHERE TO_CHAR(history_date, 'Y') = TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'Y') AND TO_CHAR(history_date, 'MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'MM') AND TO_CHAR(history_date, 'DY') = TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'DY') AND member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO history_tbl (history_index ,history_date, member_id) VALUES (history_tbl_SEQ.NEXTVAL, SYSTIMESTAMP, #{member_id})

INSERT INTO park_history_tbl (p_history_index, history_index, p_history_in, p_history_out, p_history_price, p_history_space, p_history_date) VALUES (park_history_tbl_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{history_index}, SYSTIMESTAMP, NULL, 0, #{key}, SYSTIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM park_history_tbl ph, history_tbl ht, movie_history_tbl mh WHERE ph.history_index = ht.history_index AND ht.history_index = mh.history_index AND p_history_space = #{key}
